newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Vietnam buys 162,000/T fuel oil, plus $8.20-$8.70.
newsitem.headline: Vietnam buys 162,000/T fuel oil, plus $8.20-$8.70.

text.p: State-owned Vietnam National Petroleum Import-Export Corp (petrolimex) has bought six 27,000-tonne cargoes of fuel oil from Singapore trader Hin Leong and Dutch trader Vitol for October-December delivery, industry sources said on Monday.

Hin Leong sold four cargoes in the tender at $8.20 per tonne premium to Singapore spot quotes, on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis to Ho Chi Minh City. Two cargoes are for delivery in October, and one each in November and December.
